amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Joint Chiefs Landscape Restoration Partnership program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2548 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2548 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5817-5818, S5819; text: CR S5817-5818) To require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Joint Chiefs Landscape Restoration Partnership program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2548 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2137.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2548 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
